questions.question: What is the primary color scheme of the presented nutrition facts label?

How many milligrams of sodium are present in one serving of this product?

What is the amount of potassium, expressed in milligrams, per serving?
What is the total number of servings estimated to be contained within the packaging?
What type of information is primarily conveyed by this displayed visual element?
What is the font style predominantly used in this nutrition information display?
What is the overall shape of the nutrition facts panel?
